refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert autocorrelation sequence to polynomial of prediction filter

listitem.para: Autocorrelation sequence to be represented with an FIR linear prediction filter
Output polynomial representing the linear prediction filter e/(a(1) + a(2)z + a(3)z^2 .. a(N)z^N-1)
Output scaling for the lienar prediction filter

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function ac2poly() finds the best fit polynomial for FIR linear prediction filter a, corresponding to the autocorrelation sequence r. a is the same length as r, and is normalized with the first element. So a(1) = 1.

refsection.title: Bibliography
refsection.para: Kay, Steven M. Modern Spectral Estimation. Englewood Cliffs, NJ: Prentice-Hall, 1988.
